00089     std::vector<Ctx*> ctxstack;
00090     class CurCtx {
00091     public:
00092         static Ctx * get() {
00093             if (ctxstack.size() > 0) {
00094                 return ctxstack[ctxstack.size()-1];
00095             } else {
00096                 Carp::croak("Devel::BindPP: missing context");
00097                 throw; // don't reach here
00098             }
00099         }
00100     };

00487     class Ctx {
00488     public:
00489         Ctx();
00490         Ctx(int arg_cnt);
00491         ~Ctx();
00493         I32 arg_len() {
00494             return (I32)(PL_stack_sp - mark);
00495         }
00497         Scalar* arg(int n) {
00498             Scalar*s = new Scalar(fetch_stack(n));
00499             this->register_allocated(s);
00500             return s;
00501         }
00503         template <class T>
00504         void ret(T n) {
00505             Scalar * s = Scalar::to_perl(n);
00506             this->ret(0, s->val);
00507         }
00508         template <class T>
00509         void ret(int n, T v) {
00510             return this->ret(n, Scalar::to_perl(v));
00511         }
00513         bool wantarray() {
00514             return GIMME_V & G_ARRAY ? true : false;
00515         }
00517         void ret(Array* ary) {
00518             unsigned int size = ary->size();
00519             if (size != 0) {
00520                 SV** sp = PL_stack_sp;
00521                 if ((unsigned int)(PL_stack_max - sp) < size) {
00522                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, size);
00523                 }
00524 
00525                 for (unsigned int i=0; i < size; ++i) {
00526                     Scalar * s = ary->fetch(i);
00527                     PL_stack_base[ax++] = s->val;
00528                 }
00529                 ax--;
00530             } else {
00531                 this->return_undef();
00532             }
00533         }
00535         void return_true() {
00536             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_yes);
00537         }
00539         void return_undef() {
00540             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_undef);
00541         }
00547         void register_allocated(Value* v) {
00548             allocated.push_back(v);
00549         }
00550     protected:
00555         SV* fetch_stack(int n) {
00556             return PL_stack_base[this->ax + n];
00557         }
00558         void ret(int n, SV* s) {
00559             PL_stack_base[ax + n] = s;
00560         }
00561         void initialize();
00562         I32 ax;
00563         SV ** mark;
00564         std::vector<Value*> allocated;
00565     };
00566     Ctx::Ctx() {
00567         this->initialize();
00568     }
00569     Ctx::Ctx(int arg_cnt) {
00570         this->initialize();
00571 
00572         int got = arg_len();
00573         if (arg_cnt != got) {
00574             Carp::croak("This method requires %d arguments, but %d", arg_cnt, got);
00575         }
00576     }
00577     void Ctx::initialize() {
00578         // same as dAXMARK
00579         this->ax = *PL_markstack_ptr + 1;
00580         --PL_markstack_ptr;
00581         this->mark = PL_stack_base + this->ax - 1;
00582 
00583         ctxstack.push_back(this);
00584     }
00585     Ctx::~Ctx() {
00586         std::vector<Value*>::iterator iter;
00587         for (iter = allocated.begin(); iter != allocated.end(); iter++) {
00588             delete *iter;
00589         }
00590 
00591         PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + ax;
00592 
00593         ctxstack.pop_back();
00594     }

00596     Reference * Reference::new_inc(Value* thing) {
00597         SV * v = newRV_inc(thing->val);
00598         Reference * ref = new Reference(v);
00599         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00600         return ref;
00601     }

00603     Reference * Hash::fetch(const char* key) {
00604         // SV**    hv_fetch(HV* tb, const char* key, I32 klen, I32 lval)
00605         SV ** v = hv_fetch((HV*)this->val, key, strlen(key), 0);
00606         if (v) {
00607             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00608             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00609             return ref;
00610         } else {
00611             return NULL;
00612         }
00613     }
00614     Reference * Array::fetch(I32 key) {
00615         SV ** v = av_fetch((AV*)this->val, key, 0);
00616         if (v) {
00617             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00618             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00619             return ref;
00620         } else {
00621             return NULL;
00622         }
00623     }
00624     Scalar * Array::pop() {
00625         SV* v = av_pop((AV*)this->val);
00626         return Scalar::create(v);
00627     }
00628     Scalar * Array::shift() {
00629         SV* v = av_shift((AV*)this->val);
00630         return Scalar::create(v);
00631     }
00632     Scalar * Array::store(I32 key, Scalar* _v) {
00633         _v->refcnt_inc();
00634         SV** v = av_store((AV*)this->val, key, _v->val);
00635         if (v) {
00636             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00637             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00638             return ref;
00639         } else {
00640             return NULL;
00641         }
00642     }

00658             char * buf = const_cast<char*>( (pkg + "::" + name).c_str() );

00666             this->add_constant(name, val->val);

00668

00670         void add_constant(const char *name, T val) {
00671             Scalar * s = Scalar::to_perl(val);
00672             this->add_constant(name, s->serialize());
00673         }
00674     protected:
00675         void add_constant(const char *name, SV* val) {
00676             newCONSTSUB(stash, const_cast<char*>(name), val);

00686     class BootstrapCtx : public Ctx {
00687     public:
00688         BootstrapCtx() : Ctx() {
00689             xs_version_bootcheck();
00690         }
00691         ~BootstrapCtx() {
00692             PL_stack_base[this->ax] = &PL_sv_yes;
00693             PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + this->ax;
00694         }
00695     protected:
00696         // XS_VERSION_BOOTCHECK
00697         void xs_version_bootcheck() {
00698             SV *_sv;
00699             const char *vn = NULL, *module = SvPV_nolen_const(ST(0));
00700             if (this->arg_len() >= 2) {
00701                 /* version supplied as bootstrap arg */
00702                 _sv = PL_stack_base[ax+1];
00703             } else {
00704                 /* XXX GV_ADDWARN */
00705                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00706                         vn = "XS_VERSION"), FALSE);
00707                 if (!_sv || !SvOK(_sv))
00708                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00709                             vn = "VERSION"), FALSE);
00710             }
00711             if (_sv && (!SvOK(_sv) || strNE(XS_VERSION, SvPV_nolen(_sv)))) {
00712                 Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s object version %s does not match %s%s%s%s %"SVf,
00713                     module, XS_VERSION, 
00714                     vn ? "$" : "", vn ? module : "", vn ? "::" : "",
00715                     vn ? vn : "bootstrap parameter", _sv
00716                 );
00717             }
00718         }
00719     };
00720 
00724     class Code : public Scalar {
00725     public:
00726         Code(SV * _s) : Scalar(_s) { }
00728         void call(Array * args, Array* retval) {
00729             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00730 
00731             push_scope(); // ENTER
00732             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00733             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00734 
00735             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00736                 markstack_grow();
00737             }
00738             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00739 
00740             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00741                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00742                     // optimize?
00743                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00744                 }
00745                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00746             }
00747             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00748 
00749             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_ARRAY);
00750 
00751             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00752 
00753             for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00754                 Scalar * s = Scalar::create(newSVsv(*sp--));
00755                 retval->store(i, s);
00756             }
00757 
00758             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00759             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00760                 free_tmps();
00761             }
00762             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00763         }
00765         void call(Array * args, Scalar** retval) {
00766             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00767 
00768             push_scope(); // ENTER
00769             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00770             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00771 
00772             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00773                 markstack_grow();
00774             }
00775             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00776 
00777             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00778                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00779                     // optimize?
00780                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00781                 }
00782                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00783             }
00784             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00785 
00786             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_SCALAR);
00787 
00788             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00789 
00790             if (count != 0) {
00791                 *retval = Scalar::create(newSVsv(*sp--));
00792             }
00793 
00794             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00795             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00796                 free_tmps();
00797             }
00798             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00799         }
00800     };

00805     class Pointer : public Scalar {
00806     public:
00807         Pointer(SV* s) : Scalar(s) { }
00809         Pointer(void* _ptr, const char* klass) : Scalar(sv_newmortal()) {
00810             if (_ptr == NULL) {
00811                 sv_setsv(this->val, &PL_sv_undef);
00812             } else {
00813                 sv_setref_pv(this->val, klass, _ptr);
00814             }
00815         }
00816 
00820         template <class T>
00821         T extract() {
00822             return INT2PTR(T, SvROK(this->val) ? SvIV(SvRV(this->val)) : SvIV(this->val));
00823         }
00824     };

00830     class FileTest {
00831     public:
00836         static bool is_regular_file(const char * fname) {
00837             Stat_t buf;
00838             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00839             if (ret == 0 && S_ISREG(buf.st_mode)) {
00840                 return true;
00841             } else {
00842                 return false;
00843             }
00844         }
00849         static bool is_dir(const char * fname) {
00850             Stat_t buf;
00851             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00852             if (ret == 0 && S_ISDIR(buf.st_mode)) {
00853                 return true;
00854             } else {
00855                 return false;
00856             }
00857         }
00858     };

00860     Reference * Value::reference() {
00861         return Reference::new_inc(this);

00864     Str* Scalar::as_str() {
00865         if (SvPOK(this->val)) {
00866             Str * s = new Str(this->val);
00867             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00868             return s;
00869         } else {
00870             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a string",
00871                 "Devel::BindPP",
00872                 "sv");
00873         }
00874     }
00875     Pointer* Scalar::as_pointer() {
00876         if (SvROK(this->val)) {
00877             Pointer * s = new Pointer(this->val);
00878             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00879             return s;
00880         } else {
00881             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a pointer",
00882                 "Devel::BindPP",
00883                 "sv");
00884         }
00885     }
00886     Int* Scalar::as_int() {
00887         if (SvIOKp(this->val)) {
00888             Int * s = new Int(this->val);
00889             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00890             return s;
00891         } else {
00892             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a int",
00893                 "Devel::BindPP",
00894                 "sv");
00895         }
00896     }
00897     UInt* Scalar::as_uint() {
00898         if (SvIOK(this->val)) {
00899             UInt * s = new UInt(this->val);
00900             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00901             return s;
00902         } else {
00903             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a uint",
00904                 "Devel::BindPP",
00905                 "sv");
00906         }
00907     }

00919     Reference* Scalar::as_ref() {
00920         if (SvROK(this->val)) {
00921             Reference * obj = new Reference(this->val);
00922             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00923             return obj;
00924         } else {
00925             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a reference",
00926                 "Devel::BindPP",
00927                 "sv");
00928         }
00929     }
00930     /*
00931     Hash* Perl::get_stash(Str * name) {
00932         HV * stash = gv_stashpv(name->to_c(), 0);
00933         Hash * h = new Hash(stash);
00934         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(h);
00935         return h;
00936     }
00937     */
00938 
00939     Hash * Reference::as_hash() {
00940         if (SvROK(this->val) && SvTYPE(SvRV(this->val))==SVt_PVHV) {
00941             HV* h = (HV*)SvRV(this->val);
00942             Hash * hobj = new Hash(h);
00943             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(hobj);
00944             return hobj;
00945         } else {
00946             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a hash reference",
00947                 "Devel::BindPP",
00948                 "hv");
00949         }
00950     }
00951     Array * Reference::as_array() {
00952         SV* v = this->val;
00953         if (SvROK(v) && SvTYPE(SvRV(v))==SVt_PVAV) {
00954             AV* a = (AV*)SvRV(v);
00955             Array * obj = new Array(a);
00956             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00957             return obj;
00958         } else {
00959             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00960                 "Devel::BindPP",
00961                 "av");
00962         }
00963     }
00964     Scalar * Reference::as_scalar() {
00965         SV* v = this->val;
00966         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00967             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00968             Scalar * obj = new Scalar(a);
00969             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00970             return obj;
00971         } else {
00972             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00973                 "Devel::BindPP",
00974                 "sv");
00975         }
00976     }
00977     Code * Reference::as_code() {
00978         SV* v = this->val;
00979         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00980             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00981             Code * obj = new Code(a);
00982             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00983             return obj;
00984         } else {
00985             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00986                 "Devel::BindPP",
00987                 "sv");
00988         }
00989     }
00990 
00991     Reference* Hash::del(const char*key, I32 klen) {
00992         Reference * ref = new Reference(hv_delete((HV*)this->val, key, klen, 0));
00993         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00994         return ref;
00995     }
00996     void Hash::store(const char*key, I32 klen, Scalar*value) {
00997         value->refcnt_inc();
00998         hv_store((HV*)this->val, key, klen, value->val, 0);
00999     }
01000     Scalar* Hash::scalar() {
01001         Scalar*s = new Scalar(hv_scalar((HV*)this->val));
01002         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
01003         return s;
01004     }
01005     void Hash::undef() {
01006         hv_undef((HV*)this->val);
01007     }
01008     void Hash::clear() {
01009         hv_clear((HV*)this->val);
01010     }
01011     Boolean* Boolean::yes() {
01012         Boolean* s = new Boolean(true);
01013         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
01014         return s;
01015     }
01016     Boolean* Boolean::no() {
01017         Boolean* s = new Boolean(false);
01018         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
01019         return s;
01020     }
01021 
01022     Scalar* Scalar::create(SV* s) {
01023         Scalar * v = new Scalar(s);
01024         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(v);
01025         return v;
01026     }
